entry.title: ..Handcrafted Coir Christmas Tree
entry.summary:

Type:
Price: 400.00 - 805.00 (5 variants)

With all the glitter and shine of the holiday season it can be relaxing to indulge in natural Christmas decoration & reconnect with Nature.

Introducing Coconut fiber Christmas tree to make this Christmas extra special for you! Handcrafted with love and dedication, our Coir Christmas tree will add to your Christmas celebration. It’s earthy and rustic nature gives a traditional holiday touch to your Christmas decor.

If you love handmade, Natural Christmas decor, safe and ideal for kids, this made by hand and love Coir Christmas tree might be a special choice

Contains: 1 x Handcrafted Coir Christmas Tree

entry.title: The Lazy Monkey – Hand Block Printed Muslin Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 2100.00

““As we jumped from one bed time story to another,

Those dreamy eyes started growing smaller.

As sweet little dreams came knocking at the door,

And Under a blanket of clouds they snored.”

Snuggle up your little one in our traditional hand block printed baby blankets woven from the finest cotton muslin to make snuggle time cozy and warm. With a playful pattern of “The Lazy Monkey” that will keep your little one occupied amidst the tales of Nature.

Our baby blankets are handcrafted by skilled artisans from Rajasthan in India. The style of handblock print used is specific to this region which preserves this art, as more than skill it is their identity and voice. These blankets make for a perfect heirloom to pass down through generations.

Our blankets are made from three thick layers of the finest quilted GOTS certified organic cotton muslin with a 100% pure cotton filling, making them both child & environment friendly. As the babies grow these blankets can serve multi-purpose as a swaddle blanket, nursery receiving blanket, stroller canopy, comfy travel blanket, burp cloth, nursing cover, play mat, and more.

*Note – Some irregularities like missing print, light and dark areas, fabric joint, little smudges are not considered as flaw but as beauty of hand block print.”

Dimensions: 112×112 cm | 44×44 in

Features:

– 0-3 years

– Hand block printed & hand-quilted.

– Azo-free dye pigment block printing.

– Suitable for all seasons

– 3 layers of muslin cotton cover

– Lightweight, soft and breathable

How To Care?

All of our muslin light weight, super soft, and will get even softer, puffing up like a little happy cloud with every wash.

Machine wash in Cold water gentle/ delicate mode only (30c or low). Use mild detergent. Air dry in shade. Do not bleach.

entry.title: .Reusable Neem Wood Cutlery
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 250.00

Our neem wood cutlery is a sustainable and perfect pair for taking on the go, using for lunches and during travel.

This lightweight rustic cutlery is naturally stylish and can make great companion when you are on the go! By using our Neem cutlery, one can avoid tons of single-use plastic waste, promoting a plastic-free and healthy environment.

Neem wood is naturally durable and resistant to water, making it perfect for serving both hot and cold dishes. The smooth finish and ergonomic design ensure a comfortable experience.

Contains

1 × Spoon

1 × Fork

*Material – Neem Wood

*Care –

-Hand-wash with Luke Warm water and mild soap.

-Use Coconut Oil to rehydrate your Cutlery

Note – Do not use in Microwave and Dishwasher.

*Disposal – Once it wears out, Compost it.

*Packaging – We ensure that all our packaging is eco-friendly

entry.title: .Seed Color Pencils (Pack of 10)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 200.00

Our Seed pencils are made from recycled paper. These pencils comes along with different seeds attached at the end which you can use to plant trees in your house or garden.

Not only that, these come in different shades of color and gives a creative touch to your artwork.

Creative at the same time environment friendly. Seed Pencils are nature friendly and helps to promote Biodiversity.

Switch to these recycled Seed Pencils and redefine the way you make use of pencils.

*Size – 18cms

*Material – Recycled Paper, Seeds

*Packaging – We ensure that all our packaging is eco-friendly

entry.title: Kids Bamboo Toothbrush Pack of 2 – Eco-Friendly & Biodegradable
entry.summary:
Vendor: Almitra Sustainables
Type:
Price: 315.00

Kids Bamboo Toothbrush – Gentle, Eco-Friendly Oral Care by Almitra Sustainables

Nurture Healthy Smiles with a Natural, Biodegradable Choice

Make brushing fun and eco-conscious with our Kids Bamboo Toothbrush—specially designed for little hands and sensitive gums. Crafted from ethically sourced, biodegradable bamboo, this toothbrush helps your child take their first steps toward a zero-waste lifestyle while maintaining great oral hygiene.

The ultra-soft, BPA-free bristles are gentle on young teeth and gums, ensuring a safe and effective clean every time. Perfect for families looking to reduce plastic waste, our toothbrush is a sustainable swap that’s safe for both your child and the planet.

Whether you’re starting your child’s sustainable journey or looking for an eco-upgrade, the Almitra Sustainables Kids Bamboo Toothbrush is a trusted, natural choice for everyday care.

Product Highlights:

  • Made from 100% biodegradable, organic bamboo
  • BPA-free soft bristles – perfect for children’s sensitive gums
  • Ergonomic, kid-friendly design for easy grip
  • Naturally antimicrobial and durable
  • Compostable packaging
  • Plastic-free and zero-waste approved

Help your child form sustainable habits early—one brush at a time.

entry.title: Reusable Stainless Steel Straw Set with Cleaning Brush & Cotton Pouch
entry.summary:

Reusable Stainless Steel Straw Set – Eco-Friendly, Durable & Travel-Ready

Say Goodbye to Plastic – Sip Sustainably with Almitra

Make the switch to a greener lifestyle with Almitra Sustainables’ Reusable Stainless Steel Straw Set. Thoughtfully crafted for the eco-conscious consumer, this stylish and practical alternative to single-use plastic straws is perfect for daily use at home, office, cafés, or on the go. Whether you're sipping smoothies, juices, or iced coffee, this sustainable straw set has you covered.

What’s Included

  • 2 Premium-Grade Stainless Steel Straws – Rust-resistant, BPA-free, and reusable for years.
  • 1 Natural Fiber Cleaning Brush – Keeps your straws hygienic and easy to clean.
  • 1 Organic Cotton Carry Pouch – Branded, breathable, and ideal for on-the-go convenience.

Why You’ll Love It

  • Eco-Friendly & Zero Waste – Helps reduce plastic pollution and supports a more sustainable lifestyle.
  • Durable & Safe – Made from high-quality stainless steel that’s food-safe and non-toxic.
  • Stylish & Functional – Sleek metallic finish with a minimalist aesthetic.
    Perfect for Gifting – A thoughtful present for eco-warriors, students, travelers, and more.
  • Easy to Clean – Cleaning brush included; dishwasher-safe for extra convenience.

Ideal For

  • Daily hydration and on-the-go sipping
  • Zero waste homes and eco-friendly cafés
  • Festivals, travel kits, and office lunches
  • Eco-conscious gifting
